form.text: Manufactured Home (make, model and identification number)
form.label: QUESTION

form.text: STEP 3: Type of Exemption and Qualifications
form.label: HEADER

form.text: Check the exemption for which you are applying.
form.label: QUESTION

form.text: Surviving Spouse or Child of a Deceased Disabled Veteran
form.label: ANSWER

form.text: Surviving Spouse or Child of Armed Service Member who died on Active Duty
form.label: ANSWER

form.text: Please provide the following information and attach documentation from the V.A. or service branch identifying the most recent disability rating.
form.label: QUESTION

form.text: Does the service connected disability include:
form.label: QUESTION

form.text: Loss of one or more limbs
form.label: ANSWER

form.text: Blindness in one or both eyes
form.label: ANSWER

form.text: If yes, are you: Under 18 years of age?
form.label: QUESTION

form.text: Number of qualifying parent's children who are under 18 and unmarried
form.label: QUESTION

form.text:
If you were eligible for this exemption last year, check this box and enter the prior tax year. You must have met all of the qualifications above on January 1
of the prior tax year to receive the exemption for last year.
form.label: QUESTION

form.text: Application for exemption for prior tax year,
form.label: ANSWER
